Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d10 Strength: d6 Vigor: d8

Battle: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d6 Occult: (sma) d6+2

Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Knowledge (Craft (Weaving)): (sma) d4 Riding: (agi) d8
Faith: (spi) d4 Knowledge (Folklore): (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Languages: Anari
Skill Notes:
Library: +4 Skill Points (choice of Knowledge)
Old Family: +2 Occult
Ugly: -1 Persuasion
All Thumbs: Suffers -2 using mechanical and electrical devices; critical failure breaks device
Arcane Background (Heahwisardry): -2 arcane skill, +1 per extra round taken (+4 max)
Linguist: Knows 8 languages
Noble: +2 Persuasion (networking with aristocrats)/+2 Common Knowledge (etiquette, heraldry, gossip)
Size: 0 Deity: Freo
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 30 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 16; Skill: 4
Description Notes: Diverse: +2 Improvement Points (edge or skills)
Features
Edges (8 points): Arcane Background (Heahwisardry); Library; Linguist; Noble; Old Family; Rich; Styrimathr; Warm Blooded Hindrances: All Thumbs; Big Mouth; Quirk; Ugly Anari Human Abilities: Diverse
Feature Notes:
Big Mouth: Cannot keep secrets
Quirk: Has a minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Rich: 3x starting funds
Styrimathr: Owns a Smabyrding
Combat
